sense.gloss: restoration, rehabilitation, recovery, return, replevin, improvement

k_ele.e: 天網恢恢疎にして漏らさず

r_ele.r: てんもうかいかいそにしてもらさず

sense.gloss: heaven's net has large meshes, but nothing escapes
heaven's vengeance is slow but sure, heaven's net is wide and coarse, yet nothing slips through

sdata.j: ↑天網↑↓てんもう↓恢恢↑疎↑↓うと↓にして↑漏↑↓も↓らさずの↑言葉↑↓ことば↓とおり、↑天罰↑↓てんばつ↓てき↑面↑↓めん↓だ。
sdata.e: They say fate will catch up with you. That was God's way of punishing him.
